live_updates: Ongoing extreme weather and damage to road infrastructure is causing delays in shipping replacement equipment and tech home visits to Hope as well as causing issues in getting access to some areas to complete work. We will have more updates by end of day Wednesday and will continue work diligently to get customers back online as soon as possible. Thank you for your continued patience.
Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services.  We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
On-site technicians continue working diligently to resolve this outage.
BC Hydro does not have an ETA on repairs at the moment, and expect work to take most of the day. Once power has been restored, our crews will be on site to restore services.
Tech crews continue to work in the area to restore services.

Technicians and Hydro crews continue to work to restore service as quickly possible. However, due to the nature of the repairs involved, We are unable to provide an ETA Thank you for your patience! We will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Due to the complexity of this outage, our technicians are still working to resolve it.
Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.

Our technicians continue to work to restore services where possible, while also awaiting restoration of hydro power to our equipment in certain areas. Further updates will be provided as they become available.
Work is still being done on-site, with no ETA at this time.

We continue to await restoration of hydro power to be restored in the affected areas. Once hydro is restored our services will begin to come online.

44000.summary: Due to extreme weather and driving conditions in British Columbia, some customers are temporarily without service. Once weather conditions in the affected areas subside, our local technicians will work to restore services as quickly as possible. Please note there will be delays in technician visits and equipment shipping. Our thoughts go out to all those impacted by the extreme weather and we greatly appreciate your patience during this time.
